design.description: The design of the site was inspired by John Maeda's Laws of Simplicity.

principles.label: Reduce
principles.value: The simplest way to achieve simplicity is through thoughtful reduction.

principles.label: The one
principles.value: Simplicity is about subtracting the obvious, and adding the meaningful.
